attributes.action: stop keeping cows in constant pain and pregnancy to produce milk for human consumption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dairy cows go through constant pain to deliver humans with milk every day. They produce 20 times more milk than is necessary. As a result they die much earlier than their life expectancy which should be around 20 years. Our dairy cows on average die at around 2 or 3! In unnessacary pain.
